text:
Apache is going down very frequently and most of the time it goes in a stopping 
mode which results in shutdown and restart of the windows server as a whole.

1) While analysing thru netstat was able to find many connections with 
FIN_WAIT_2 in the server
2) There were more than 1 instance of apache.exe (4 instances) running always 
and were not able to bring down the others even.

Environment details:

Windows 2000 Server with APACHE 2.0.49, PHP 4.3.2 & ORACLE 9i d/b.
creator: rajesh.khanna@polaris.co.in

text:
Try 2.0.53 and the latest version of PHP; there were PHP issues which would take
out whole processes in 4.3.2.
